generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz emblem visible on the hood, indicating the perspective is from a vehicle on the road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area adjacent to the road, separated by a curb and trees, which is characteristic of a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including a large, historic-looking building with towers in the background and modern commercial buildings on the right.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and road, providing shade.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Many pedestrians are visible crossing the street and walking along the sidewalks, including individuals of various ages and attire.
- car: A blue Chevrolet sedan is prominently visible on the right side of the road, and a black car is partially visible next to it.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible above the pedestrian crossing, indicating that vehicles should stop.
- traffic sign: A "30" speed limit sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
